citations.narrative:
Twenty Five macaques did not receive food for a period of six days . The lack of food caused poor body condition
in 2 animals which resulted in their euthanasia. The lack of food was due to a miscommunication between
employees. Non human primates must be fed at least once a day. The facility has now assigned an employee to
ensure daily husbandry of all animal rooms has occurred.
CORRECT : From This Day Forward
The focused inspection and exit briefing was conducted with the attending veterinarian and the site director.

narrative:
3.82(b)           CRITICAL
FEEDING.   
Twenty Five macaques did not receive food for a period of six days . The lack of food caused  poor body condition
in 2 animals which resulted in their euthanasia. The lack of food was due to a miscommunication between
employees. Non human primates must be fed at least once a day. The facility has now assigned an employee to
ensure daily husbandry of all animal rooms has occurred. 
CORRECT : From This Day Forward 
The focused inspection and exit briefing was conducted with the attending veterinarian and the site director.
